primary_features: Sliding Door with Frosted Glass Panels

visual_attributes.lighting: Natural light with ambient indoor lighting
visual_attributes.texture: Smooth surfaces with the exception of the wallpaper

modern_adaptations: Use of Frosted Glass for Privacy and Contemporary Look
indian_context.space_utilization: The space is designed for visual separation and privacy between rooms
indian_context.cultural_significance: The polka dot pattern adds a touch of Indian aesthetics, often seen in traditional garments and modern decor

ai_generated_tags.description: The image depicts a contemporary hallway with Indian-inspired elements. The space features a polka dot wallpaper with a mix of green and beige dots, a sliding door with frosted glass panels and a black frame, and marble flooring. The door design, with its modern frosted glass panels, reflects a blend of traditional and modern Indian interior design principles. The wallpaper pattern subtly echoes traditional Indian textiles, adding a cultural touch to the otherwise modern space.

metadata.functionality: Visual separation and privacy between rooms
